SELECT t1.OBJID, t1.DEPT_NAME, t1.DEPT_LEVEL, t2.DEPT_NAME AS PARENT_ID, t1.REMARK, t1.DISPLAY_ID, t1.DELETE_FLAG, t1.BAKUP_FLAG, t1.BAKUP_TIME FROM SSB_DEPT t1 LEFT JOIN SSB_DEPT t2 ON t1.PARENT_ID = t2.OBJID
t1.OBJID = #where.ObjId#
t1.DEPT_NAME like '%'||#where.DeptName#||'%'
t1.PARENT_ID like '%'||#where.ParentId#||'%'
t1.ERP_CODE like '%'||#where.ErpCode#||'%'
t1.REMARK like '%'||#where.Remark#||'%'
t1.DELETE_FLAG = #where.DeleteFlag#
ORDER BY $OrderString$
